## Service Description ##

The Correctional Service of Canada requires interpretation services for American Sign Language (ASL) and/or Langues des signes québécoise (LSQ) to facilitate communication between offenders, Correctional Service Canada (CSC) staff, and Parole Board of Canada (PBC) members during various case management and medical appointments.

## Service Requirements ##

*   Provision of consecutive and simultaneous ASL and/or LSQ interpretation services for meetings
*   Complete, accurate, and faithful interpretation to the original message
*   No recording of any kind, and no information related to the service is to be held or retained by the service provider or their personnel
*   Prior to CSC booking onsite services, consideration must be given to providing the service by teleconference
*   Notification of cancellations with a minimum of one business day
*   Monthly progress reports

## Standing Offer Information ##

*   Period of the Standing Offer: August 1, 2024 to March 31, 2025,
